title: Marketscrape
description: A web application that analyzes Facebook Marketplace listings to provide insights on the best deals, allowing for significant leverage in bargaining.

title: Qoaba
description: A social media platform that allows users to share and study technical interview questions, and adapts to their unique styles.

title: Workout Planner
description: A web application that recommends workout plans based on selected muscle groups, and optimizes based on maximal muscle recruitment.

title: Nightrader
description: A microservice based stock trading platform that allows users to buy and sell stocks in real-time, as well as manage their portfolio.
